senses.sense_definition: The situation where a television programme or event continues past its scheduled time.

examples.text: The football game caused a twenty-minute <w>runover</w> for the following show.
Due to the <w>runover</w>, the evening news started much later than planned.

senses.sense_definition: A line of text that exceeds the available space or moves to the next line.

examples.text: The graphic designer adjusted the font size to prevent a <w>runover</w>.
There is a bad <w>runover</w> in the second column that needs fixing.
